system.description: At 14th level, you deal double damage to objects and constructs.  When attacking an object or construct you may roll engineering in place of your attack roll.  In addition when you use a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.6pknmho30imyfpjo]{Crowbar} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.gf1g2dgug6mn5pa8]{Portable Ram} to make a strength check you may apply your Intelligence instead of strength and gain an additional expertise die on the check.
